Name: Lost Home : Battle Of Island
About the game: LOST HOME: Battle of Island is an Open World Survival game set in Remote Island. Your task is to survive and make the Island safe to live for others. You are dropped on an Island tasked with cleaning the zombies and making the island habitable again but can you survive with the limited ammo and equipment. Story In the near future, a new plague had spread across the globe turning most to mindless Zombies. The only place humans can survive is on the Islands. However, the Zombies have started showing up on the Island shores crossing the huge Oceans. The military has evacuated the Islands from Civilians. Yous task is to get back to these Islands and Investigate to find a way to stop the Zombies and make the Islands safe again for Civilians. Features Dynamically Changing Environment. Day-night cycle Fight using Advance weapons Defend yourself against hordes of Zombies. Surviving the jungle with limited Resources.
